title: New: Eddi Front – Nobody Does It Better (Carly Simon Cover)
body:
Having wowed during her SXSW shows, **Eddi Front** has released this gorgeously delicate cover of Carly Simon’s _Nobody Does It Better_.

With one of the finest voices in music, combined with the sombre instrumentation, it’s only a matter of time before the Brooklyn songstress is a star. Check out the cover below, and grab a free download while you can.
